0.text: TARGET IMMUNITY: 10
Innate: Zed's basic attacks against targets below 50% maximum health are empowered to deal 6 / 8 / 10% (based on level) of the target's maximum health as bonus magic damage.
0.html: Innate: Zed's basic attacks against targets below 50% maximum health are empowered to deal 6 / 8 / 10% (based on level) of the target's maximum health as bonus magic damage.

0.text: 6 / 8 / 10% (based on level)

markedPassages: 6 / 8 / 10% (based on level) of the target's maximum health
6 / 8 / 10% (based on level) of the target's maximum health

1.text: Against  monsters, Contempt for the Weak deals 200% damage, capped at 300.
1.html: Against monsters, Contempt for the Weak deals 200% damage, capped at 300.
markedPassages: monsters

2.text: Contempt for the Weak cannot occur on the same  champion more than once every few seconds.
2.html: Contempt for the Weak cannot occur on the same champion more than once every few seconds.
markedPassages: champion

0.text: TARGET RANGE:  925
Active: Zed throws a shuriken in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit, reduced to 60% against targets beyond the first.
0.html: Active: Zed throws a shuriken in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit, reduced to 60% against targets beyond the first.

0.text: TARGET RANGE: 650
Passive: Zed restores  energy whenever he and his  Shadows or multiple Shadows hit an ability on the same target. This may only occur once per cast ability.
0.html: Passive: Zed restores  energy whenever he and his Shadows or multiple Shadows hit an ability on the same target. This may only occur once per cast ability.
markedPassages: energy

1.text: Active: Zed creates a  Shadow that dashes to the target location and remains for 5.25 seconds, being able to mimic  Razor Shuriken and  Shadow Slash while in range. Living Shadow can be recast while within range of the Shadow.
1.html: Active: Zed creates a Shadow that dashes to the target location and remains for 5.25 seconds, being able to mimic Razor Shuriken and Shadow Slash while in range. Living Shadow can be recast while within range of the Shadow.
markedPassages: Razor Shuriken
Shadow Slash

2.text: Recast: Zed and the  Shadow  blink to swap places. If Living Shadow was recast while the Shadow is dashing, the recast will instead occur once it has been placed.
2.html: Recast: Zed and the Shadow blink to swap places. If Living Shadow was recast while the Shadow is dashing, the recast will instead occur once it has been placed.
markedPassages: blink

3.text: If an ability is cast while the Shadow is dashing, it will cast that ability once it has been placed. See Pets for more details about Shadows. Living Shadow will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
3.html: If an ability is cast while the Shadow is dashing, it will cast that ability once it has been placed. See Pets for more details about Shadows. Living Shadow will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: EFFECT RADIUS:  315 / 290
Active: Zed slashes to deal physical damage to nearby enemies.
0.html: Active: Zed slashes to deal physical damage to nearby enemies.

1.text: Enemies hit by a  Shadow's slash are  slowed for 1.5 seconds, multiple slashes deal no additional damage but the slow's effectiveness is increased by 50%.
1.html: Enemies hit by a Shadow's slash are slowed for 1.5 seconds, multiple slashes deal no additional damage but the slow's effectiveness is increased by 50%.
markedPassages: slowed

2.text: Living Shadow's cooldown is  reduced by 2 seconds for each enemy  champion hit by Zed's slash.
2.html: Living Shadow's cooldown is  reduced by 2 seconds for each enemy champion hit by Zed's slash.
markedPassages: Living Shadow's
reduced
champion

0.text: TARGET RANGE: 625

Active: Zed becomes  untargetable and, after 0.6 seconds, he  dashes 125 units through the target enemy champion over 0.35 seconds. Afterwards, he becomes targetable again, renders them Marked for Death for 3 seconds, and gains  ghosting for the same duration.
0.html: Active: Zed becomes untargetable and, after 0.6 seconds, he dashes 125 units through the target enemy champion over 0.35 seconds. Afterwards, he becomes targetable again, renders them Marked for Death for 3 seconds, and gains ghosting for the same duration.
markedPassages: untargetable
dashes
ghosting

1.text: Zed also spawns a  Shadow at his casting position for 9 seconds which is able to mimic  Razor Shuriken and  Shadow Slash while in range. Death Mark can be recast after 0.5 seconds of his reappearance while the  Shadow is active, though not in the last 1.25 seconds of its duration.
1.html: Zed also spawns a Shadow at his casting position for 9 seconds which is able to mimic Razor Shuriken and Shadow Slash while in range. Death Mark can be recast after 0.5 seconds of his reappearance while the Shadow is active, though not in the last 1.25 seconds of its duration.
markedPassages: Razor Shuriken
Shadow Slash

2.text: Marked for Death: Zed stores a portion of all pre-mitigation physical damage and magic damage he and his  Shadows deal to the target, detonating at the end of the duration to deal physical damage.
2.html: Marked for Death: Zed stores a portion of all pre-mitigation physical damage and magic damage he and his Shadows deal to the target, detonating at the end of the duration to deal physical damage.

3.text: Recast: Zed and the  Shadow  blink to swap places.
3.html: Recast: Zed and the Shadow blink to swap places.
markedPassages: blink

4.text: If the target dies or is 1950 or more units away before the dash begins, Death Mark is cancelled, goes on a  0.5-second cooldown, and Zed reappears at the cast location. The  Shadow spawned also disappears.
4.html: If the target dies or is 1950 or more units away before the dash begins, Death Mark is cancelled, goes on a  0.5-second cooldown, and Zed reappears at the cast location. The Shadow spawned also disappears.
markedPassages: 0.5-second
